```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=10, fig.height=7, message=FALSE}
library(XML)
library(lubridate)
library(plyr)
library(reshape2)
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)

###############
#  functions
sub <- function(x, replace=c("--"), by=NA) {
  x <- as.character(x)
  idx <- which(x %in% replace)
  if (length(idx) > 0) x[idx] <- by
  x
}

fixYear <- function(date) {
  month <- month(date)
  dm <- c(0, diff(month))
  cdm <- cumsum(dm > 2)
  2015 - cdm
}
###############
# show! 
rcp.dem <- "http://www.realclearpolitics.com/epolls/2016/president/us/2016_democratic_presidential_nomination-3824.html"

tables <- readHTMLTable(rcp.dem)
dems <- data.frame(tables[[4]])

#dems <- dems[nrow(dems):1,]

demsNA <- lapply(dems, sub)
write.csv(demsNA, "temp.csv", row.names=FALSE)
dems <- read.csv("temp.csv")

dates <- strsplit(as.character(dems$Date), split=" - ")
d2 <- ldply(dates, function(x) data.frame(
  startDate = mdy(paste(x[1],"15", sep="/")),
  endDate = mdy(paste(x[2],"15", sep="/"))))
dems <- data.frame(dems, d2)

year(dems$endDate) <- fixYear(dems$endDate)
year(dems$startDate) <- fixYear(dems$startDate)
dems$year <- year(dems$endDate)

samples <- strsplit(as.character(dems$Sample), split=" ")
s2 <- ldply(samples, function(x) data.frame(
  pollSize=suppressWarnings(as.numeric(x[1])),
  voterType=x[2]
))
s2$voterType[is.na(s2$voterType)] <- dems$Sample[is.na(s2$voterType)]
dems <- data.frame(dems, s2)
idx <- which(nchar(levels(dems$Poll)) %% 2 == 0)


mdems <- melt(dems, measure.vars=5:7, na.rm=TRUE)
mdems <- subset(mdems, Poll != "RCP Average")


 lastPoll <- sprintf("Last Poll on %s", max(mdems$endDate))
    cols <- c(brewer.pal(12, name="Paired"), "grey30", "grey50", "grey70", "grey80", "grey60")
    mdems$voterType <- factor(mdems$voterType, c("RV", "LV", "A"))
    
    p <- ggplot(aes(x=endDate, y=value, colour=Poll), data=subset(mdems, year >=2015)) +
      geom_smooth(aes(group=variable), colour="grey30", se=FALSE, size=.75) +
      geom_point(aes(x=endDate, y=value, shape=voterType), size=2.5) + 
      scale_colour_manual(values=cols) + theme_bw() +
      theme(legend.position="bottom") + xlab("Date of Poll") + ylab("Percent") +
      facet_wrap(~variable) +
      scale_shape_manual("Type of Poll",values=c(19, 1, 4)) +
      ggtitle(lastPoll)
    
   print(p)
```
